pr_title: [2.48.10 hotfix] Update retry time overflow fix

timeline.message: fixes calculation for exponential delay to not overflow

timeline.bodyText: A comment would be helpful for future reference. Are there no tests for this code?
timeline.author: snopoke

replies.bodyText: @snopoke yeah unfortunately there were no tests for this code. I have not added any in this PR since this code is no longer present in newer mobile releases and now we are instead relying on Android framework to determine the retry timing.
